docs.snippet: Coincidental with the Postoffice Department's appeal for early Christmas mailing. Harllee Branch, Second Assistant Postmaster General, announced the latest sailing dates from New York which will permit the delivery of mail in foreign countries before...
docs.lead_paragraph: Coincidental with the Postoffice Department's appeal for early Christmas mailing. Harllee Branch, Second Assistant Postmaster General, announced the latest sailing dates from New York which will permit the delivery of mail in foreign countries before Christmas.

headline.main: HOLIDAY DATES SET FOR FOREIGN MAIL; Postoffice Warns Those Who Plan Christmas Greetings to Send Them Early.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Nov. 16. -- Hugh S. Gibson left for Rio de Janeiro today to resume his duties as United States Ambassador to Brazil after serving as a delegate to the Chaco peace conference here. Spruille Braden, the new United States peace delegate,...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Nov. 16. -- Hugh S. Gibson left for Rio de Janeiro today to resume his duties as United States Ambassador to Brazil after serving as a delegate to the Chaco peace conference here. Spruille Braden, the new United States peace delegate, arrived Wednesday and immediately assumed his duties as the United States representative at the conference.

headline.main: GIBSON LEAVES PARLEY TO RETURN TO POST; Ambassador to Brazil Replaced at Buenos Aires Chaco Conference by Braden.

byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: ROME, Monday, Nov. 18. -- Last midnight was the zero hour for economic hostilities between Italy and the "sanctionist" powers, which hostilities will rage more bloodlessly but perhaps with more far-reaching results than the warfare in East Africa.
docs.lead_paragraph: ROME, Monday, Nov. 18. -- Last midnight was the zero hour for economic hostilities between Italy and the "sanctionist" powers, which hostilities will rage more bloodlessly but perhaps with more far-reaching results than the warfare in East Africa.

headline.main: ITALY DEFIES PENALTIES; Citizens Toast Her as the Zero Hour Strikes at Midnight.

docs.snippet: Foreign exchanges were irregular last week. Changes were slight, however, since no great volume of business was involved and traders were disposed to await progress of developments in the Italo-African situation.
docs.lead_paragraph: Foreign exchanges were irregular last week. Changes were slight, however, since no great volume of business was involved and traders were disposed to await progress of developments in the Italo-African situation.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES; WEEK ENDED NOV. 16, 1935.

docs.snippet: A large one-man show by the Russian artist, Boris Gregoriev, opened with a private view yesterday at the Academy of Allied Arts, 349 West Eighty-sixth Street, to remain until Dec. 21. It is restrospective in scope, containing work that was done...
docs.lead_paragraph: A large one-man show by the Russian artist, Boris Gregoriev, opened with a private view yesterday at the Academy of Allied Arts, 349 West Eighty-sixth Street, to remain until Dec. 21. It is restrospective in scope, containing work that was done fifteen years ago and, at the other end of the gamut, work done as recently as last Summer.

headline.main: NEWS OF ART; Gregoriev Show Opens.
